page.title: 05FISHING AND BIRDWATCHING
page.content: I like my area because of the Broads and the dykes where I can go fishing and birdwatching. The people are nice and kind. Some of the birds you can see are Cranes,Bitterns,Herrons,Grebes,Ducks and Coots.Also there are Hedgehogs, Foxes,Mice,Rats,Hares and Rabbits. If you go fishing there you will catch Perch,Pike,Roach,Rudd,Bream and Eels. Dotted around our villages are hides and birdwatching places,because the inhabitants respect wildlife. It is very quiet and peaceful because we have few main roads. The country side is very beautiful and has a lot of colourful wild flowers that brighten up the place. All the way through the area there are a lot of footpaths which are very interesting with some nice trees.
